widget.title: Voice AI Assistant
widget.subtitle: Ask me anything about this store!
widget.welcome_message: Hello! I'm your Voice AI assistant. How can I help you today?
widget.tip_message: Tip: You can use voice input by clicking the microphone button!
widget.voice_error: Sorry, there was an error with voice recognition. Please try typing your message.
widget.voice_not_supported: Sorry, speech recognition is not supported in your browser. Please use the text input instead.
